profile: Who We Are Allure Window Decor Inc. has been a leader in the window fashions industry for almost ten years. We specialize in ALL custom window coverings. We carry an extensive line of window treatments – if you’ve seen it, we have it. Whether its blinds, shutters, drapes, or shades … We are an exclusive dealer of the Eclipse Shutters which is the leading vinyl shutter in the marketplace. Eclipse shutters are greeguard certified, waterproof, and carry a 25 year warranty

profile: Amazing Window Fashions is a one stop shop for all Interior Designers, decorators, Developers, real-estate professionals and consumers. We feature an extensive selection of high quality window covering options to fit varying styles and budgets. We are pleased to offer an outstanding showroom of over 9000 square feet that is outfitted with full size displays, allowing clients to visually comprehend what the window covering looks and feels like. Given the enormous variety and quality of products we carry, the Showroom lends itself to be used by Interior Designers and decorators as a Design Resource Center. Our ongoing partnership between Amazing Window Fashions and the Interior Design community ensures that designers and decorators have easy access to the best window covering selections at preferred pricing. Our affiliation with Workroom By Design gives us the power to produce high quality products in no time, whether you have one window or 800 windows our workroom is equipped to deal with both trade and public needs. Our professional team of experts will assist you with everything you need to complete your project in a timely manner, from check measure to the final installation we do it all, we are very passionate with everything we do. Our goal is to earn your trust and build a long term relationship with your company. You can learn more about us by visiting our website www.amazingwindowfashions.com Hunter Douglas

profile:
Window Fashions Depot provides a large selection of interior & exterior window fashions; Shutters, Blinds, Shades, Drapery, Drapery Hardware and Specializes In Window Fashions Motorization. The Window Fashions Depot team is proud to share our passion for window coverings with home owners and businesses alike. 

We offer personalized and customized window covering designs that fit your needs and budget. The showroom is equipped with full sized displays, giving you the opportunity to easily see, touch, and compare products. Our experienced consultants are more than happy to work with you to achieve the look you desire, and offer free in-home consultations, with no obligations.

Adding the finishing touches to your space with style!
We carry a large selection of window coverings for every space.
Located in Toronto - we serve Toronto and the GTA.
Contact us for a quote - we are happy to help and be a part of your project.
